step.cmd: Ensure that the intake air and/or vent (exhaust) piping is the correct size for the installed length. See .
Ensure that the maximum equivalent feet of pipe has not been exceeded for the intake air and/or vent pipe. See .
Ensure that the maximum number of elbows has not been exceeded in the intake air and/or vent pipe. See .
Ensure that the intake air screen has been removed from the intake air connection on the water heater when installing the water heater in a direct vent configuration. See
Ensure that all exterior clearances for the intake air, vent, concentric, and low-profile terminations are maintained.

info.p: These clearances and those cited by local and national codes must be maintained.
